Name: Night Shade
Effect: Single Target. Roll Ghost-Type Damage Dice according to the User's Rank: Starter 1 Die / Rookie 2 Dice / Standard 4 Dice/ Advacned 6 Dice / Expert 8 Dice / Ace and forward 10 Dice. Ignore Defenses.
Description: The user casts a shade with a frightening mirage inside that torments the target.
